Docs.typeparam: The value type with the indexer.
Docs.summary: Represents an element referenced by an indexer on a value type that can be used as an l-value in an expression.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of arguments that represent the indices of the element in the indexer array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ValueTypeIndexerReference%602.Indices%2A> property is read-only, but the items in the collection can be modified and the indices can be changed.
